name: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: The Great Gatsby is a story of love, wealth, and ambition in the 1920s, where Jay Gatsby's quest to rekindle a lost romance reveals the dark side of the American Dream.

name: Animal Farm
author: George Orwell
description: Animal Farm is a satirical tale where farm animals rebel against humans, only to face corruption and tyranny, highlighting the dangers of power and totalitarian regimes.

name: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: Pride and Prejudice is a witty romance where Elizabeth Bennet navigates love, class, and family, while confronting her own prejudices, and the pride of the enigmatic Mr. Darcy.
